channel.title: Deathiant~Server In the Making!
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b][u]Deathiant[/u][/b][/size]
[size=12pt]My stituation: I have bought a vps (windows 2003 1gb ram) I am looking for staff: moderators ingame, forum moderators, coders, advertisers, [b]donators[/b] and gfx maker. I have a source at the moment it is a soulsplit remake.[/size]
Features:
-Game modes extreme, easy, hard, medium. -Sir owens long, full -Soulsplit shops -Full dicing (comes up in clanchat) -Desert pyramid (ancient prayers) -Nex armours -Full godwars
Coming soon:
-Armadyl battle staff -Loyalty titles -Zaryte bow
[b]If you would like to be apart of this server please post in your replies with the following:[/b]
[code] Irl name: Prefered name: Age: Skills: Area of work: What can you do for the server: Why would you like to be apart: How long are you on a day: [/code]
Hope to see a lot of replies, if I am not active on here add me on skype: harvi1998 Gl to the applicants!

item.title: Deathiant~Server In the Making!
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

when you have ‘needing staff’ in a development thread, i cant take it srsly.

Read full topic

item.title: Deathiant~Server In the Making!
item.dc:creator: @Harvi Harvi
item.description:
@Harvi wrote:

I need a team in order for this server to be a success, more minds are better than one. Also I am in search of a coder to help meh I am still a noob.

Read full topic

item.title: Deathiant~Server In the Making!
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

[quote=“Teemo, post:2, topic:462768”]Irl name: Jacob
Prefered name: Teemo
Age: 14
Skills: Java, sports, fucking bitchs, etc.
Area of work:
What can you do for the server: Nothing.
Why would you like to be apart: I don’t
How long are you on a day: 25/8[/quote]
You can’t even spell.

OT: I was wondering why you already looking for staff members when you are still in development?

Read full topic
